name: SFSpeechRecognizerAuthorizationStatus
desc: The app's authorization to perform speech recognition.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The app's authorization status has not yet been determined.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: The user denied your app's request to perform speech recognition.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: The device prevents your app from performing speech recognition.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: The user granted your app's request to perform speech recognition.
